text:
Our stay at Joep & Courtneys place was only a brief one (our choice!), but very agreeable nonetheless. Joep was very flexible and accommodating towards our check-in needs and a very warm & welcoming host. The house is located in a very nice and quiet part of town, and the room is very comfortable.

Because we wanted to see as much of Austin as we could in the limited time we had, we only spent a short time with Joep, but he gave us some very useful tips on restaurants (Hopdoddy's  is absolutely worth the visit) and place to go see.

When we return to Austin we'll try and stay with Joep & Courtney again for sure!

Bedankt voor de geweldige gastvrijheid!
title: North Austin garden haven
